N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-3.3 - District plan

State Regulations
(a) A city
school district required to set aside a portion of its comprehensive operating
aid for early grade intervention shall file a plan with the commissioner by

August 1st of the current school year detailing a program to reduce class size
and increase individualized attention in grades one, two and three, procedures
for improved instructional strategies to be used with those pupils who are
experiencing learning difficulties in reading, writing and arithmetic and shall
indicate how the district will use funds setaside for early grade intervention
for such purposes. Notes
